subject: Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: In a statement that seemed to inch closer to an acceptance of blood testing in baseball, the players’ union leader, Donald Fehr, said he would consider approving blood testing for human growth hormone if there were a valid, efficient procedure for determining its use over an extended period.
